page.title: 10CEMENTATION LTD, HERMITAGE
page.content: Cementation trades in countries all over the world. It is a large company, split into a number of divisions, each of which pursues its own specialist business eg marine and sea defence work, motorway and trunk road construction, bridge work heavy industrial foundations etc. The Hermitage workshops are concerned with the repair and maintenance of heavy plant and machinery. They use tools such as lathes,drills, piling machines, power saws, shaping and grinding machines.In the yard they use mobile cranes, fork lift trucks and lorries. The workers at the Hermitage site come from a 15 to 20 mile radius around Hermitage, although not a great number live within the village.
